thread.section_title: Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel; quaint location
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel; quaint location - Review of Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MaverickTempest8
title: Excellent hotel; quaint location
text: This hotel is in a great location for touring around, and would also work great for business. The outside isn't much to look at, but as soon as you step inside, and certainly up in the room, it has a very "New York" feel. The elevator is very slow, but it's only 7 floors at most, so it's not unbearable. I did have some accounting questions at checkout, but that doesn't reflect on the stay itself. I would stay here again, for sure.
